Task ID:
\h(«De Loco»)Witness the awesome power of my Flame Cannon!
The thicker the forest, the more it burns!
HAHAHAHAHA!!!\e

\h(«De Loco»)After I burn down the forest, I will be able to 
find the Lost City of Rixis, and the 
Moon Crystal will be mine!!!\e

\h(«Vice Captain»)Lord De Loco!
There's a ship approaching from the aft.\e
\h(«Vice Captain»)It matches the description of those Air Pirates!\e

\h(«De Loco»)Vyse is here?!
He's the kid that escaped from the Grand
Fortress and defeated Belleza!\e

\h(«De Loco»)Perfect!!! PERFECT!!! 
He's just in time to feel the heat from my
Flame Cannon!\e

\h(«De Loco»)Hehehehe…
I wonder how Vyse likes his food…\e

\h(«De Loco»)I hope he doesn't die too fast!
HAHAHAHAHAHA!!!\e

\h(«Aika»)The forest!
This is horrible! 
What kind of twisted psycho would do this?\e
\h(«Vyse»)Whoever it is, he'll have to deal with me!\e

\h(«Drachma»)If we get hit by that blast of fire, we're
done for. We'll have to dodge the flames,
and counterattack!\e

\h(«De Loco»)What?! What?!!!
Impossible! My… my Flame Cannon! How!?!?!\e

\h(«De Loco»)It can't be! It can't be! It can't be!
There was no way they could defeat me!!!
This must be a dream… A dream! I tell you!!!\e

\h(«Vice Captain»)Sir… sir!
Get a hold of yourself!\e

\h(«Vice Captain»)We must retreat!
Head back to Moon Stone Mountain!\e

\h(«Aika»)Alright!
We've got them on the run!\e

\h(«Vyse»)They're probably searching for the Moon
Crystal, too. We've got to hurry!\e

\h(«Alfonso»)Look… Over there!
So, King Ixa'taka was hiding the Crystal 
from us after all…\e

\h(«Alfonso»)Heh, this is going to be easy.
All I have to do is take the Crystal from him 
and the Empress will be pleased.\e

\h(«New Vice Captain»)Oh, and I heard that you were injured 
in the mines. Are you alright, sir?\e

\h(«Alfonso»)I don't ever want to hear you speak of those
mines again! Understand?!\e

\h(«Alfonso»)All ships, prepare for battle!
Follow my flagship, the Cygnus!
Head towards the light and find King Ixa'taka.\e

\h(«Alfonso»)Blast! Retreat!!!
We cannot get past the Gigas!\e

\h(«New Vice Captain»)But… but… sir…
The battle hasn't even started yet.\e

\h(«Alfonso»)Why are you questioning my orders?!
I refuse to die in these filthy lands! 
All ships, return to Valua at once!\e

\h(«De Loco»)This cannot be!
How could I lose twice?!\e

\h(«De Loco»)No… No… No…
No… this has to be a dream… 
It's all just a bad dream…\e

\h(«Vice Captain»)Sir!
Get a hold of yourself!\e

\h(«Vice Captain»)We can't face the Gigas in this shape! 
All ships, back to Valua!\e

\h(«Drachma»)It's still too early to celebrate.
We still have to stop Grendel!\e
\h(«Vyse»)But… he's too big! How can we stop him?\e

\h(«Drachma»)No matter how strong that thing is, if it falls
into the canyon, it will be stuck.\e

\h(«Vyse»)I see…
So, all we have to do is knock it down!\e

\h(«Drachma»)Aye!
Wait for him to pass in front of it,
then hit him in the back!\e

\h(«Vyse»)Got it!
Alright everyone, let's take him down!\e

EV_E21発生しました。
この後船ばとるなんでイベント
みてください。\c
Ｅ２２のイベントを通過しました。\c
